title: Elon Musk's Twitter Has Been More Compliant with Government Requests, Not Less
description:
After castigating OG Twitter for its cooperation with government content requests, it turns out that Elon Musk’s version of the platform hasn’t been doing much better since he took over half a year ago. Not only has Musk Twitter™️ been responding to a variety of government requests—but it’s been doing so at a much…

title: The Hunger Games Prequel's First Trailer Invites You to Enjoy the Show
description:
Set “64 years before Katniss Everdeen volunteered as tribute, and decades before Coriolanus Snow became the tyrannical President of Panem,” The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes explores the origin story of that future tyrant. After a couple of cryptic teasers, a full trailer has finally arrived.

title: This Bittersweet Star Trek Short Imagines the Rebirth of the Enterprise-D
description:
The restoration of the Enterprise-D, long thought lost since it was broken up and crash-landed decades prior in Star Trek: Generations, was one of the biggest surprises of Picard’s final season. But now we know that parts of the ship made their way back home to be restored, this touching new short imagines just how.

Read more...

title: Watch Live as a SpaceX Falcon Heavy Attempts First Fully Expendable Mission
description:
SpaceX is getting ready to launch its super heavy-lift rocket for the second time this year, carrying a hefty broadband satellite to a distant orbit above Earth’s equator, as well as a pair of smaller satellites, before being disposed entirely.

title: We Saw One of Mission: Impossible 7's Most Epic Action Scenes
description:
With a trailer that’s been out in the world for almost a year now, expectations couldn’t be any higher for Tom Cruise’s Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One. Except they can go higher, now that Paramount’s screened 20 minutes of breathtaking footage at CinemaCon 2023.

title: Clubhouse Slashes More Than Half Its Staff
description:
Clubhouse is downsizing, big time. The company, which launched its audio-based social platform in the early pandemic days of April 2020, is now laying off more than half of all of its workers.

title: Bones Found in Lake Mead Finally Identified as Missing Man
description:
Human remains unveiled in Lake Mead’s low water levels last year have finally been identified as a Las Vegas man who went missing years ago, local authorities said this week.

title: Watch Taylor Swift Sing Kanye's 'Heartless' and 14 Other AI Covers
description:
Artificial intelligence and the music industry are having a moment, and it’s unclear at this point whether it’s a great one. As AI generators like ChatGPT and DALL-E get better and better, so too do AI voice generators—and that’s no better exemplified than the rise of completely fabricated songs from major artists.

title: FDA Approves Poop-Based Pill to Treat Hardy Gut Infections
description:
The healing powers of poop can now officially come in a more palatable pill. This week, the Food and Drug Administration approved the drug Vowst, an oral capsule packed with beneficial bacteria derived from human fecal matter. The drug is intended to treat recurrent infections of Clostridioides difficile by balancing…

title: How to Access Your TikTok Watch History
description:
We’ve all been there: You’re in a conversation with friends, and you desperately try to find a TikTok that you had scrolled past that could serve as a funny contribution to the current topic of conversation. You hastily search and scroll through the app and finally find it, but it’s too late—your companions have moved…

title: Mexico's President Is Killing It on YouTube
description:
The Mexican government’s press conference from the Palacio Nacional on Wednesday looked like it was part of a late-night comedy skit. title: Joe Manchin Is Back on His Bullsh*t
description:

title: Jupiter Moon Probe Switches On Science Instrument for the First Time
description:
It’s been less than two weeks since the European Space Agency’s (ESA) JUICE mission began its journey to Jupiter, but the spacecraft has wasted no time getting itself ready to explore the gas giant system.

title: 10 May Day Lessons We Learned From The Wicker Man
description:

description:

The animated reboot brings a new sense of style to the classic TMNT quartet—voiced for the first time in the franchise…

description:
The Justice Department filed a motion on Thursday to hold Pentagon leaker Jack Teixeira without bail, arguing he is a flight risk and presents “an ongoing risk both to the national security of the United States and to the community.” Teixeira, 21, allegedly released sensitive and confidential government information on…

description:
The Transformers franchise is returning to its animated roots with Transformers: One, and now we know who’ll be lending their voice to the film.

title: A Massive Project Is Helping Scientists Unravel the Genetic Secrets of Mammals
description:
In expansive new research out this week, scientists around the world have started to unravel the genetic secrets behind one of nature’s greatest success stories: mammals. They’ve catalogued and compared the genomes of more than 200 mammal species, including elephants, bats, and humans. Among other things, their…

title: Hackers Take Control of Government-Owned Satellite in Alarming Experiment
description:
Just how vulnerable are the thousands of government-operated satellites speeding along their orbits above our heads? A team of researchers proved they could hack into a European Space Agency-owned satellite, allowing them to take full control of its communication, imaging—and even its maneuverability systems.

Read more...

title: Researchers Just Used Knots of Worms to Understand the Science of Tangles
description:
A team of mathematicians and engineers is unraveling the wriggly mystery of blackworms; specifically, the researchers are trying to understand how the worms are able to disentangle even quicker than they (intentionally) intertwine.

Read more...

title: Scientists Sequence Genome of Famous Good Boy Balto the Sled Dog
description:
Balto the sled dog is famous for being part of a sled team that delivered medicine from Fairbanks, Alaska, to Nome, Alaska, through harrowing blizzard conditions in 1925. Now, a team of scientists has sequenced the dog’s genome using DNA found in his taxidermied remains.

Read more...

title: Watch Mark Hamill Give Cameron Monaghan Jedi Lessons
description:
If you’re looking to have the Force, er... your heart grow three sizes today, look no further than this incredibly charming skit from EA Star Wars that shows what happens when the legendary Mark Hamill shows up on the set of Star Wars: Jedi Survivor to give Cameron Monaghan some pointers.

title: After the Death of BuzzFeed News, Journalists Should Treat AI as an Existential Threat
description:
Last week, BuzzFeed nuked its entire newsroom, laying off an already significantly reduced team that had never been quite the same since the company forced out droves of investigative and politics reporters last March. And while you certainly couldn’t call this the first major newsroom layoff in history, it did feel…

title: Elon Musk's Attorneys Claim Deepfake Defense in Tesla Autopilot Case
description:
“I really would consider autonomous driving to be basically a solved problem,” Tesla CEO Elon Musk said during the Q&A portion of a 2016 interview at a Vox Recode conference. “A Model S and Model X at this point can drive autonomously with greater safety than a person, right now,” he added. Or...did he?

title: A Guide to Disney's Messy Legal Battle With Florida's DeSantis
description:
Florida Governor Ron DeSantis continues to fumble his presidential bid over unconstitutional squabbles with the Walt Disney World Resort that undermine his own political agenda.

title: Invasive Spotted Lanternflies Are Hatching Soon. Kill Them. Kill Them All.
description:

title: These Lens Adapters Are Like Vintage Instagram Filters for Modern Cameras
description:

title: Twitter Cuts Search Bar Access for Unregistered Users
description:
Twitter is eliminating its search feature for anyone not logged into an account. The change means that any person attempting to access the site’s search results would need to log in to their existing account or create a new one in what could be CEO Elon Musk’s latest attempt to drive up the number of users on the…

title: The First Trailer for Disney's Wish Has Definite Star Power
description:
If Disney had to make an animated movie that obliquely celebrated the studio’s 100-year anniversary, it could have done far, far worse than an origin story of sorts for the stars that so many Disney characters have wished upon for the last century. And, according to this first trailer, that’s exactly what Wish is—a…

title: You Can Finally Buy Dyson's $949 Air Purifying Headphones
description:
Initially revealed over a year ago, Dyson’s first audio product, a pair of noise-canceling headphones called the Zone that still manages to incorporate the company’s expertise with cleaning and purifying air, officially goes on sale today in the US with a price that’s as expensive as both Apple and Sony’s premium…

description:

title: Buckle Up, Zuck: AI Coming to WhatsApp, Messenger, and ‘Metaverse’
description:
Meta’s latest quarterly earnings report is hung up on the “efficiency” buzzword. In his call with investors on Wednesday, CEO Mark Zuckerberg talked up “efficiency work,” more than once, all while sprinkling in talk of “monetization efficiency” and “organizational efficiency.”

title: Pricing Leaks Show the Asus ROG Ally Could Be a Genuine Steam Deck Competitor
description:
The Steam Deck was a groundbreaking device when it arrived last year to change what everyone thought handheld gaming could be, and while many competitors’ devices claim to outperform Valve’s handheld, Asus’ ROG Ally could be the first true Steam Deck killer, especially if this leaked pricing info proves to be accurate.

title: Behold, the Terrifying New Posters For The Little Mermaid
description:

title: Elizabeth Holmes Won't Report to Prison Today After All
description:
After being convicted of wire fraud for her dealings with her failed blood startup Theranos, Elizabeth Holmes has white-knuckled herself to freedom for just a little bit longer. A last minute legal filing on Tuesday has delayed her 11-year prison sentence, which was expected to begin today.

title: NASA Scientists Extract Oxygen From Simulated Moon Dirt
description:
In a groundbreaking step towards establishing a human presence on the Moon, NASA extracted oxygen from simulated lunar soil in a “dirty” chamber with similar conditions to the Moon’s environment.

title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts Trailer Offers Full-Blown Beast Wars
description:

description:

title: ‘Our Free Will Is Being Taken’: Montana TikTokers Caught in Legal Limbo After State’s Unprecedented Ban
description:
When Spencre McGowan, an herbalist and a cookbook writer in Butte, Montana, started posting on TikTok to help pull herself out of a “depressive funk” in 2021, she could have never imagined her quick, rustic videos of comforting food recipes and outdoor wanderings would net her an audience of 110,000 committed followers

description:

description:

title: The Creator, the New Film From Rogue One's Gareth Edwards, Looks Incredible
description:
